title: Ciborium for the Sacrament
displaydate: 1460s-c.1470 (stem with integral base); probably 1860s-c. 1870 (dome, enclosure, base beneath enclosure); 1870s (finial, bottom plinth)
dimensions:
overall: 322.1 × 80.8 × 69.9 cm, (126 13/16 × 31 13/16 × 27 1/2 in.), 2357 lb.
gross weight (base): 1217 lb.
gross weight (tabernacle): 621 lb.
gross weight (dome): 411 lb.
gross weight (finial): 108 lb.
attribution: Florentine 15th Century, possibly after a model by Desiderio da Settignano (stem with integral base); Florentine 19th Century (dome, enclosure, base beneath enclosure, finial, bottom plinth)
